    • getStackTraceNullable

      public static @Nullable String getStackTraceNullable(@Nullable Throwable ex)
      Faster alternative to ExceptionUtils.getStackTrace(Throwable) as it uses StringBuilder internally instead of StringBuffer.

    • throwSneakily

      public static <T extends Throwable> RuntimeException throwSneakily(Throwable ex) throws T
      IMPORTANT: Checked exceptions thrown with this method are not catched by try { } catch(RuntimeException ex) { }

      Throws the given exception bypassing the compiler check for checked exceptions.

      This is considered a hack. You should prefer using wrapAsRuntimeException(Throwable).

      Throws:
      T extends Throwable

    • toString

      public static String toString(StackTraceElement[] stacktrace)

    • wrapAsRuntimeException

      public static RuntimeException wrapAsRuntimeException(Throwable t)
      Wraps the given exception if not already a runtime exception.
